Name: Purgatory a la Française
Ingredients: 20 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This Islay smoke-influenced drink makes for a great nightcap.
History: Adapted from a recipe created circa 2010 by Arthur Combe at Curio Parlour bar in Paris, France.
